title: Is the Piltover mini-site abandoned?

embed.description: Piltover is a thriving, progressive city whose power and influence is on the rise. It is Valoran's cultural center, where art, craftsmanship, trade and innovation walk hand in hand.

body:
I've seen the [new Singed lore](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/singed-thenightmare-story), but I don't see it updated on the Piltover mini site. I tried changing the address to /zaun, but didn't work either.
Is this site abandoned, and are they just switching over to Universe? I really liked the mini site...

replies.body: Would it be possible to link the Featured Pages to the Universe page? Like, to their respective regions/champions? It's really hard to find them without a direct link.
I mean it could be down to the fact that, y'know, Singed ain't a Piltovian champion?
The thing is that on the piltover site,there is a zaun logo,implying that the site will either be expanded to include zaun as well,or for it to at least include a link to a zaun-site.
Yes but suggesting that the site be abandoned because one story hasn't been posted there? Uncalled for I'd say.

Yup,definetly agree with this.
I mean in Camilles case we didn't get the Piltover page until after they revealed her(I think Camilles lore-pieces even appeared on the universe site before the piltover site was added)
To be fair, this story will likely be there once the Zaun Icon is revealed

I mean technically yes, but they did have the Zaun logo on the side.
Also tried /zaun but that was a long shot tbh
For those that dont celibrate December and January holidays, Rito employees had a holiday break. So yeah, thats why no updates for 2 weeks.
I can understand that, but the question was why the lore was updated while the site wasn't.

Because that story isn't a part of the site. It is it's own thing to tease the upcoming update for Warwick while also giving us more insight into Singed.

It'll probably become a part of the site once they get around to the Zaun portion. Obviously, they're waiting for the WW update before that happens.

Piltover site came after Camilles reveal
So Waricks might be revealed in a similar fashion before the Zaun page.

Its like they use the champions as a gateway to the faction event so to speak.

The zaun site is likely coming after warwicks rework gets revealed.

What we've got was just a teaser,similar to the comic with Camille.
